response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a high-quality asset but also to save $100,000 compared to its worth. I believe this offer presents a favorable balance between value and cost, making it a compelling proposition for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
